attributes.action: remove the VAT on the TAX in the cost of fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that fuel duty is a valid tax, however I can not understand why there is a Value Added Tax on TAX, Tax has no value it is not a product it is not a service the retailer can not make profit from it. So removing the VAT only from the Fuel duty should be considered.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
